extracted_playbook.title: Update Google Chrome to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Google Chrome browser to the latest version to apply patches for CVE-2024-0519 and other vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Automatic Updates for Google Chrome
extracted_playbook.description: Enable automatic updates for Google Chrome to ensure timely application of security patches.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Other Chromium-based Browsers
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that other Chromium-based browsers such as Microsoft Edge, Brave, Opera, and Vivaldi are updated to their latest versions.

affected_products: Google Chrome prior to version 120.0.6099.234 for Mac
Google Chrome prior to version 120.0.6099.224 for Linux
Google Chrome prior to version 120.0.6099.224/225 for Windows
